name: Zombie tag (Frogman27)
description:
Play a game of tag with Zombies.  Get touched and join their ranks.  Don't dispair though.  You can still find an antidote as long as you have time.  2 minute rounds.  Up to 4 players using PUN.  Level designed by Projektivity.  Code Monkey was Frogman27.

Control is bad in the web version.  Adding keyboard shortcuts to make it easier.
